alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:46PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill, eastern Dawes and southeastern Sioux Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 546 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Red Cloud Campground to near Box Butte Campground to 9 miles north of Kilpatrick Lake to 6 miles northeast of Lake Minatare. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Chadron, Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte, Alliance Airport, Box Butte Campground, Red Cloud Campground, Box Butte Dam, Kilpatrick Lake, Chadron Campground, Berea, Chadron Airport, Whitney, Marsland and Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
